author: Christoph Guttandin
description: A module to create a set of unique numbers as fast as possible.
name: fast-unique-numbers

scripts.build: rimraf build/* && tsc --project src/tsconfig.json && rollup --config config/rollup/bundle.mjs && babel ./build/es2019 --config-file ./config/babel/build.json --out-dir ./build/node
scripts.lint: npm run lint:config && npm run lint:src && npm run lint:test
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:expectation-chrome && npm run test:expectation-firefox && npm run test:expectation-node && npm run test:unit-browser && npm run test:unit-node
scripts.test:expectation-chrome: if [ "$TYPE" = "" -o "$TYPE" = "expectation" ] && [ "$TARGET" = "" -o "$TARGET" = "chrome" ]; then karma start config/karma/config-expectation-chrome.js --single-run; fi
scripts.test:expectation-node: if [ "$TYPE" = "" -o "$TYPE" = "expectation" ] && [ "$TARGET" = "" -o "$TARGET" = "node" ]; then mocha --bail --parallel --recursive --require config/mocha/config-expectation.js test/expectation/node; fi
scripts.test:unit-browser: if [ "$TYPE" = "" -o "$TYPE" = "unit" ] && [ "$TARGET" = "" -o "$TARGET" = "chrome" -o "$TARGET" = "firefox" -o "$TARGET" = "safari" ]; then karma start config/karma/config-unit.js --single-run; fi
scripts.test:unit-node: if [ "$TYPE" = "" -o "$TYPE" = "unit" ] && [ "$TARGET" = "" -o "$TARGET" = "node" ]; then mocha --bail --parallel --recursive --require config/mocha/config-unit.js test/unit; fi
